code:
flowchart TD
    A([Start System Update]) --> B{Choose action}
    B -- Check only --> C[Receive report of available updates]
    B -- Schedule --> D[Set window/maintenance time]
    B -- Run now --> E[Review scope + risk]
    B -- Cancel --> Z([Done])
    E --> F{Approve?}
    F -- No --> Z
    F -- Yes --> G[Execute update]
    G --> H{Reboot required?}
    H -- Yes --> I[Plan reboot window; notify users]
    H -- No --> J[No reboot]
    I --> K{Completed?}
    J --> K
    K -- Yes --> L[Notify success; log]
    K -- No --> M[Notify failure; assign follow-up]
    L --> Z
    M --> Z
repo_description: Fast TUI for searching, inspecting, and queueing pacman/AUR packages.
